abstract: Neck roll, catchall term for a few styles of protective devices that sprout from between a football player's shoulder pads, was once ubiquitous piece of equipment in National Football League, but is now no longer in fashion.
snippet: Giants players became nostalgic when discussing the neck roll, which was once a ubiquitous piece of equipment in the N.F.L. but is now no longer in fashion.
lead_paragraph: Giants players became nostalgic when discussing the neck roll, which was once a ubiquitous piece of equipment in the N.F.L. but is now no longer in fashion.

headline.main: Glory Has Faded for the Neck Roll; Memories Have Not
headline.print_headline: Glory Has Faded For the Neck Roll; Memories Have Not
headline.seo: N.F.L.: Once Big, Neck Rolls Are Now a Nostalgia Piece
